评论详情: I was plesantly surprised about the quality of this necklace.  The fit was nice too.
The pendant is nice. But wish the chain were more heavy duty. Bought it for my 9yrold. Holding up ok so far since october.

This was a painted pendant and chain. The clasp wouldn’t open because it was painted shut. The stone pendant sits sideways because it’s not balanced well. I know it’s just a costume piece and would have kept it one I cut the paint a little to free the clasp and a piece of the pendant that was stuck but the balance issue makes it look horrible so I’m returning.
